lead_paragraph: Venus Williams bounced back from a slow start in her first tournament since winning Wimbledon to defeat Anastassia Rodionova, 6-3, 6-0, in a first-round match last night at the Acura Classic in Carlsbad, Calif. Williams, the six-time Grand Slam champion, was playing her first event since defeating Marion Bartoli in straight sets to win her fourth Wimbledon title July 7.
